import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; import "./event.css"; import RegistrationForm from "./RegistrationForm"; export default function EventDetails() { const { eventId } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [showRegistrationForm, setShowRegistrationForm] = useState(false); const eventDetails = { codeconquer: { title: "TECHPRESENTX", date: "March 14, 2026", time: "09:00 AM", location: "Department of Information Technology", about: "TECHPRESENTX is a Paper Presentation event. It is a technical event where participants showcase their ideas, research insights, and innovative solutions on emerging technologies. This platform encourages students to explore real-world problems, think critically, and present their concepts with clarity and confidence. It‚Äôs an opportunity to demonstrate knowledge, creativity, and presentation skills before a panel of judges.(Team Composition: 2-3 members)", prize: [ { place: "1st Place", amount: "Details" }, { place: "2nd Place", amount: "Details" }, { place: "3rd Place", amount: "Details" }, ], }, terrain: { title: "THINK & INK", date: "March 14, 2026", time: "9:00 AM", location: "Department of Information Technology", about: "Poster Designing & Presentation is a dynamic event that blends creativity, innovation, and communication skills. Participants will design an engaging and impactful poster based on the given themes and present their ideas before the judges within the allotted time.The event is divided into Technical and Non-Technical categories, encouraging students to express their thoughts on social responsibility, creativity, emerging technologies, and future innovations.Through visual storytelling and confident presentation, participants must clearly convey their concept, originality, and relevance of the theme. The event duration is 1 hour 30 minutes.This competition evaluates creativity, clarity of thought, design aesthetics, innovation, and presentation skills.(Individual Participation)", prize: [ { place: "1st Place", amount: "details" }, { place: "2nd Place", amount: "details" }, { place: "3rd Place", amount: "details" }, ], }, sustaino: { title: "PROTOSHOW", date: "March 14, 2026", time: "9:00 PM", location: "Department of Information Technology", price: "‚Çπ100.00", about: "Details", prize: [ { place: "1st Place", amount: "‚Çπ5000 + Certificate" }, { place: "2nd Place", amount: "‚Çπ3000 + Certificate" }, { place: "3rd Place", amount: "‚Çπ1000 + Certificate" }, ], }, techtraid: { title: "TECH-TRAID", date: "Feb 14, 2026", time: "11:00 AM", location: "REC", price: "‚Çπ90.00", about: "Technical trivia and debugging competition. Test your knowledge and problem-solving abilities in this fast-paced technical event.", prize: [ { place: "1st Place", amount: "‚Çπ4000 + Certificate" }, { place: "2nd Place", amount: "‚Çπ2500 + Certificate" }, { place: "3rd Place", amount: "‚Çπ1500 + Certificate" }, ], }, codearena: { title: "CODE ARENA", date: "Feb 14, 2026", time: "03:00 PM", location: "REC", price: "‚Çπ100.00", about: "Competitive programming event. Solve complex algorithmic problems in a time-bound competition to prove your coding excellence.", prize: [ { place: "1st Place", amount: "‚Çπ5000 + Certificate" }, { place: "2nd Place", amount: "‚Çπ3000 + Certificate" }, { place: "3rd Place", amount: "‚Çπ1000 + Certificate" }, ], }, mysterymanor: { title: "MYSTERY MANOR", date: "Feb 15, 2026", time: "04:00 PM", location: "AUD", price: "‚Çπ60.00", about: "A mystery-solving game where teams work together to solve puzzles and uncover secrets in an engaging event.", prize: [ { place: "1st Place", amount: "‚Çπ3000 + Certificate" }, { place: "2nd Place", amount: "‚Çπ1500 + Certificate" }, { place: "3rd Place", amount: "‚Çπ500 + Certificate" }, ], }, theboardroom: { title: "THE BOARDROOM", date: "Feb 16, 2026", time: "05:00 PM", location: "GND", price: "‚Çπ70.00", about: "Business simulation event. Test your entrepreneurial and strategic thinking skills in a realistic business scenario.", prize: [ { place: "1st Place", amount: "‚Çπ3500 + Certificate" }, { place: "2nd Place", amount: "‚Çπ2000 + Certificate" }, { place: "3rd Place", amount: "‚Çπ1000 + Certificate" }, ], }, blabberbox: { title: "BLABBER BOX", date: "Feb 17, 2026", time: "06:00 PM", location: "OUT", price: "‚Çπ50.00", about: "Public speaking and communication event. Showcase your presentation and speaking skills on the big stage.", prize: [ { place: "1st Place", amount: "‚Çπ2500 + Certificate" }, { place: "2nd Place", amount: "‚Çπ1500 + Certificate" }, { place: "3rd Place", amount: "‚Çπ500 + Certificate" }, ], }, debate: { title: "TUNE TREK / DEBATE", date: "Feb 15, 2026", time: "07:00 PM", location: "AUD", price: "‚Çπ40.00", about: "A mix of music and debate events. Express yourself through music performances or engage in heated competitive debates.", prize: [ { place: "1st Place", amount: "‚Çπ2000 + Certificate" }, { place: "2nd Place", amount: "‚Çπ1200 + Certificate" }, { place: "3rd Place", amount: "‚Çπ500 + Certificate" }, ], }, franchisetable: { title: "THE FRANCHISE TABLE", date: "Feb 15, 2026", time: "08:00 PM", location: "AUD", price: "‚Çπ65.00", about: "Entrepreneurship case study event. Analyze and solve real-world business problems and franchising scenarios.", prize: [ { place: "1st Place", amount: "‚Çπ3000 + Certificate" }, { place: "2nd Place", amount: "‚Çπ1800 + Certificate" }, { place: "3rd Place", amount: "‚Çπ800 + Certificate" }, ], }, }; const details = eventDetails[eventId] || eventDetails["codeconquer"]; const handleRegister = () => { setShowRegistrationForm(true); }; return (

{details.title}

Date: {details.date}
Time: {details.time}
Location: {details.location}
‚ÑπÔ∏è About the Event
{details.about}
üë• Who Can Participate
  • Open to all college students
  • Students from any year of study can participate
  • Students from any department are eligible
  • No restrictions on academic background
üéÅ Prize Pool
    {details.prize.map((item, index) => (
  • {item.place}: {item.amount}
    • ))}
üìã Rules & Regulations
  • Timing: Event duration will be decided before the event
  • Eligibility: Only currently enrolled students are eligible
  • Device Requirements: Participants must arrange their own devices
  • Code of Conduct: Professional conduct is mandatory
  • Judging Criteria: Code quality, innovation, and efficiency
  • Disqualification: Any form of plagiarism or misconduct will result in disqualification
  • Winners Announcement: Winners will be announced post-event
  • Decision Final: Judge's decision will be final and binding
setShowRegistrationForm(false)} eventId={eventId} />
); }
